mapper.select: SELECT T5.HMNRSC_EMPNO /*인사사원번호 - 판매자사번*/ , T5.PRTNR_KNM /*판매자명*/ , T5.OG_NM /*조직명 - 판매자소속*/ , T1.CNTR_NO || '-' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_NO /*계약번호*/ , T8.CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , T8.BRYY_MMDD /*고객 생년월일*/ , T9.PD_NM /*상품명*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_TP_CD', T9.PD_TP_CD) AS PD_TP_CD /*상품유형*/ , T2.CNTR_CNFM_DTM /*계약확정일시 - 접수일*/ , T1.SPP_DUEDT /*배송예정일자 - 예정일*/ , T3.IST_DT /*설치일*/ , T2.CNTR_CAN_DTM /*취소일*/ , T1.STPL_PTRM /*약정기간*/ FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = '9020' AND T2.SELL_OG_TP_CD = 'HR1' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T3 /*계약WELLS상세*/ ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T5 /*월파트너내역*/ ON T5.PRTNR_NO = T2.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND T5.OG_TP_CD = T2.SELL_OG_TP_CD AND T5.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN LATERAL ( /*임직원-사번변경된 경우 최종사번으로 조회*/ SELECT FNM , CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , MEXNO_ENCR , CRAL_IDV_TNO , RSGN_DT --퇴직일자 FROM TB_GBCO_EMP_BAS WHERE SAP_REF_EMPNO_VAL IS NULL --SAP 참조사번 START WITH SAP_EMPNO = T5.HMNRSC_EMPNO CONNECT BY PRIOR SAP_REF_EMPNO_VAL=SAP_EMPNO ) T6 ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_CST_REL T7 /*계약자관계코드*/ ON T7.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T7.DTL_CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND T7.CNTR_CST_REL_TP_CD = '10' /*계약자*/ AND T7.CNTRT_REL_CD = '01' /*계약자관계코드 - 01:본인, 07:지인 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T8 /*고객기본*/ ON T8.CST_NO = T2.CNTR_CST_NO AND T8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T9 /*상품기본*/ ON T9.PD_CD = T1.BASE_PD_CD AND T9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.SELL_TP_CD = '2' /*렌탈*/ AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(T3.IST_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') + 14 AND T3.IST_DT LIKE #{stYy}||#{colDv}||'%' /*매출일자-설치일자*/ --월별 취소건이면 AND T2.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NOT NULL --월별 최종구분 AND T2.CNTR_CAN_DTM IS NULL AND T5.HMNRSC_EMPNO = #{empno} ORDER BY T3.IST_DT
